languages.text: "Анонимность — тайно устранить, ввести квоты на покаяния. Если поток откровений спадет, то к экипажу будут применены меры".
"No more anonymity, but keep this change under wraps. Establish a confession quota. If there is a decline in the number of confessions, the crew will face disciplinary measures."
languages.original_text: "Анонимность — тайно устранить, ввести квоты на покаяния. Если поток откровений спадет, то к экипажу будут применены меры".

traits.locale_text: "No more anonymity, but keep this change under wraps. Establish a confession quota. If there is a decline in the number of confessions, the crew will face disciplinary measures."
"No more anonymity, but keep this change under wraps. Establish a confession quota. If there is a decline in the number of confessions, the crew will face disciplinary measures."

"No more anonymity, but keep this change under wraps. Establish a confession quota. If there is a decline in the number of confessions, the crew will face disciplinary measures."

languages.text: "Keine Anonymität mehr, aber haltet diese Änderung unter Verschluss. Legt eine Bekenntnisquote fest. Ist die Zahl der Beichten rückläufig, belegt die Crew mit disziplinarischen Maßnahmen."
languages.original_text: "No more anonymity, but keep this change under wraps. Establish a confession quota. If there is a decline in the number of confessions, the crew will face disciplinary measures."

traits.locale_text: "Keine Anonymität mehr, aber haltet diese Änderung unter Verschluss. Legt eine Bekenntnisquote fest. Ist die Zahl der Beichten rückläufig, belegt die Crew mit disziplinarischen Maßnahmen."

languages.text: « Fini l'anonymat, mais gardez le secret sur ce changement. Il faut établir un quota de confessions. Si vous constatez la moindre diminution dans le nombre de confessions, l'équipage fera l'objet de mesures disciplinaires. »
languages.original_text: "No more anonymity, but keep this change under wraps. Establish a confession quota. If there is a decline in the number of confessions, the crew will face disciplinary measures."

traits.locale_text: « Fini l'anonymat, mais gardez le secret sur ce changement. Il faut établir un quota de confessions. Si vous constatez la moindre diminution dans le nombre de confessions, l'équipage fera l'objet de mesures disciplinaires. »

languages.text: «Se acabó el anonimato, pero no revele este cambio. Establezca una cuota de confesiones. Si el número de confesiones se reduce, la tripulación ´sufrirá acciones disciplinarias».
languages.original_text: "No more anonymity, but keep this change under wraps. Establish a confession quota. If there is a decline in the number of confessions, the crew will face disciplinary measures."

traits.locale_text: «Se acabó el anonimato, pero no revele este cambio. Establezca una cuota de confesiones. Si el número de confesiones se reduce, la tripulación ´sufrirá acciones disciplinarias».

languages.text: 「匿名性はないが、この変更については伏せておくように。懺悔ノルマを設ける。懺悔の数が減れば、クルーは懲戒処分を受けることになる」
languages.original_text: "No more anonymity, but keep this change under wraps. Establish a confession quota. If there is a decline in the number of confessions, the crew will face disciplinary measures."

traits.locale_text: 「匿名性はないが、この変更については伏せておくように。懺悔ノルマを設ける。懺悔の数が減れば、クルーは懲戒処分を受けることになる」

languages.text: “这台机器的告解要采取实名制，但这个改动不准让任何人知道。建立告解词指标机制，如果这台机器收到的告解词达不到指标的话，那所有船员都会面临纪律处分。”
languages.original_text: "No more anonymity, but keep this change under wraps. Establish a confession quota. If there is a decline in the number of confessions, the crew will face disciplinary measures."

traits.locale_text: “这台机器的告解要采取实名制，但这个改动不准让任何人知道。建立告解词指标机制，如果这台机器收到的告解词达不到指标的话，那所有船员都会面临纪律处分。”

languages.text: "Bundan sonra anonimlik yok ancak bu değişikliği gizli tut. Bir günah çıkarma kotası belirle. Eğer günah çıkarma sayısında düşüş olursa mürettebat disiplin cezalarıyla karşı karşıya kalacak."
languages.original_text: "No more anonymity, but keep this change under wraps. Establish a confession quota. If there is a decline in the number of confessions, the crew will face disciplinary measures."
